title: Can a Muslim Ruler rule by other than Allah's Law skipping hadd punishments? | Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: raheem says the prescribed punishment in the quran in the sunnah such as amputating the hand of the thief killing a flogging a fornicator and stoning a adulterer etc can a muslim ruler skip that no this is allah's law no muslim ruler can rule with other than allah's law he has to do it you
